apolloPipeline.description: Leads sourced via Apollo.io, filtered by role, and loaded into Instantly for outreach
apolloPipeline.note: Continuous lead enrichment process — new leads sourced regularly via Apollo and sent through Instantly

campaigns.name: Security Professionals Outreach
campaigns.note: New leads contacted = unique individuals who received the first email of the sequence

campaigns.name: CTF Organizers Outreach
campaigns.note: Emails sent = total across all 3 steps in sequence; new leads contacted = unique individuals

items: Go-to-market strategy with 3-persona framework (CTF Organizers, Educators, Enterprise)
Competitive analysis covering CTFD, TryHackMe, HackTheBox, and enterprise alternatives
Market segmentation for US, UK, and Saudi Arabia regions
Messaging and value proposition framework per audience segment
Landing page copy and headline variants per audience
1,921 leads sourced via Apollo across 3 target segments
2 cold email campaigns launched with 3-step automated sequences
1,669 emails sent to 827 unique contacts
69 pipeline leads unified, deduplicated, and quality-scored
22 hot leads identified across security, education, and services sectors
Google Ads campaign launched with keyword targeting
Social media ad creatives designed and reviewed
Media buying plan developed with channel allocation
Ad copy variations created for multiple audience segments
Full website technical SEO audit completed
8 keyword clusters identified and mapped to content plan
Content strategy: 6-8 blog posts per month planned
302→301 redirect fixes identified (14 pages)
Internal linking strategy established
Campaign landing pages created with audience-specific variants
Platform demo video edited and published
AI Everything Event participation and lead capture (35 leads)
5 Limited Spots Giveaway campaign executed
Email automation setup via Systeme.io

blockers.impact: Cannot add new sending domains for email campaigns — limits outreach volume and sender diversity
blockers.resolution: Complete domain verification for new subdomains to enable additional sending aliases

blockers.impact: 14 pages with incorrect redirects, key pages under-optimized for search ranking
blockers.resolution: Dev team to implement 302→301 fixes and expand page content to 800-1,500 words

blockers.impact: 43% of leads have no follow-up owner, delaying conversions
blockers.resolution: Assign leads to team members and begin follow-up sequences

days30: Complete domain verification to unlock additional sending capacity
Begin hot lead follow-up sequence (22 leads)
Send technical SEO fixes to development team
Continue Apollo lead sourcing and enrichment
days60: Publish first batch of SEO blog content (6-8 posts)
Launch social media campaign based on approved brief
Expand business page content to 800-1,500 words
Build lead scoring based on engagement data
days90: Full funnel analytics review: outreach → website → conversion
A/B test campaign sequences based on performance data
Launch Spotlight Program for CTF organizer community
Quarterly business review with validated metrics
Educator outreach program with starter kits
